title: 12 Destination Spas to Visit in the US to Recharge and Relax
author: Nile Cappello
description: There's no better time than now to recharge and reboot — and meet your goals to start eating healthier, getting into shape, and treating your body more
cleaned_text: When it comes to destination health spas, it's hard to compete with [Cal-a-Vie](http://www.cal-a-vie.com/)'s 200-acre northern San Diego County grounds, 5:1 staff-to-guest ratio, and 360-degree fitness, meal, golf, and treatment programs. Designed for those looking to kick-start their journey to improved health as well as to relaxation, Cal-a-Vie offers a variety of three-, four-, and seven-night [packages](http://www.cal-a-vie.com/packages) catered toward specific interests and including combinations of spa experiences, nutritional cooking demonstrations, workout classes, and golf rounds; all stays include three meals a day from the property's renowned [culinary team](http://www.cal-a-vie.com/calavie_program/cuisine), accommodations in a Mediterranean-style villa or suite, and transfers to and from San Diego International Airport. The full-service spa offers [an extensive menu](http://www.cal-a-vie.com/calavie_program/treatments) of treatments that complement the health programs, including medical facials, acupuncture, toning wraps, reiki, massages, detox mud
